results.title: Effects of therapy with nifedipine GITS or atenolol on mental stress-induced ischemic left ventricular dysfunction.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: Both nifedipine GITS and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ are effective at preventing mental stress-induced @<m>DISEASE_Motion_Sickness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009041 @@@wall-motion abnormalities@@@, although the mechanisms may be different.

citations.NLM: Andrews TC, Parker JD, Jacobs S, Friedman R, Cummings N, MacCallum G, Mannting F, Tofler GH, Carlson W, Muller JE, Stone PH. Effects of therapy with nifedipine GITS or atenolol on mental stress-induced ischemic left ventricular dysfunction. J Am Coll Cardiol. 1998 Nov 15;32(6):1680-6. PMID: 9822096
